title: Eco-Modern 4-Bedroom Apartment Surrounded by Greenery in Suwałki
description: Experience contemporary living in this spacious 4-bedroom, 2-bathroom apartment tucked within Suwałki’s peaceful Polnocne district. Featuring 115 sqm of sun-filled interiors, the apartment offers an inviting open-plan living area with panoramic windows that blend scenic outdoor views with indoor comfort. Designed for eco-conscious living, enjoy a smart home system, energy-efficient air conditioning, a rainfall collection system for sustainable usage, and a dedicated guest bathroom. Finished with modern fixtures and ample storage, this home perfectly balances comfort, sustainability, and function.
neighborhood_description: Polnocne embodies tranquility, with abundant green surroundings and a friendly, low-key neighborhood vibe. Residents value peace and quiet, while easy highway access ensures Suwałki city center and regional amenities are conveniently close by. Walking paths and parks are just steps away, offering a green and healthy environment ideal for young lifestyle-focused homeowners.
lifestyle_benefits: quiet, green neighborhood ideal for relaxation
reduced utility bills thanks to eco-features
ample space for remote work or family growth
close proximity to green walking trails
target_buyer: Ideal for young couples eager to embrace sustainable, modern living in a peaceful community surrounded by nature.
market_positioning: Unique among local offerings, this property combines advanced eco-conveniences and smart technology in a natural, tranquil setting, providing exceptional value and comfort for buyers who prioritize sustainability and space.
